main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects, described as silver, metallic, and cigar-shaped, were sighted near Pendleton, Oregon in 1952.
interesting points: A state trooper reported sighting an unidentified object at an altitude of 4,000 feet and a high rate of speed.
The object was silver in color and observed visually without optical aids.
Several B-36 aircraft were in the area at the time of the sighting.
No radar contacts were reported in the area.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
